entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 12:56 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -6.3°C

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
